verses.verse: To the chief Musician,<WH5329> A Psalm<WH4210> of David.<WH1732> In thee, O LORD,<WH3068> do I put my trust;<WH2620> let me never<WH408> <WH5769> be ashamed:<WH954> deliver<WH6403> me in thy righteousness.<WH6666>
Bow down<WH5186> thine ear<WH241> to<WH413> me; deliver<WH5337> me speedily:<WH4120> be<WH1961> thou my strong<WH4581> rock,<WH6697> for a house<WH1004> of defense<WH4686> to save<WH3467> me.
For <WH3588> thou<WH859> art my rock<WH5553> and my fortress;<WH4686> therefore for thy name's sake<WH4616> <WH8034> lead<WH5148> me, and guide<WH5095> me.
Pull me out<WH3318> of the net<WH4480> <WH7568> that<WH2098> they have laid privily<WH2934> for me: for<WH3588> thou<WH859> art my strength.<WH4581>
Into thine hand<WH3027> I commit<WH6485> my spirit:<WH7307> thou hast redeemed<WH6299> me, O LORD<WH3068> God<WH410> of truth.<WH571>
I have hated<WH8130> them that regard<WH8104> lying<WH7723> vanities:<WH1892> but I<WH589> trust<WH982> in<WH413> the LORD.<WH3068>
I will be glad<WH1523> and rejoice<WH8055> in thy mercy:<WH2617> for<WH834> thou hast considered<WH7200> <WH853> my trouble;<WH6040> thou hast known<WH3045> my soul<WH5315> in adversities;<WH6869>
And hast not<WH3808> shut me up<WH5462> into the hand<WH3027> of the enemy:<WH341> thou hast set<WH5975> my feet<WH7272> in a large room.<WH4800>
Have mercy<WH2603> upon me, O LORD,<WH3068> for<WH3588> I am in trouble:<WH6862> mine eye<WH5869> is consumed<WH6244> with grief,<WH3708> yea, my soul<WH5315> and my belly.<WH990>

For <WH3588> my life<WH2416> is spent<WH3615> with grief,<WH3015> and my years<WH8141> with sighing:<WH585> my strength<WH3581> faileth<WH3782> because of mine iniquity,<WH5771> and my bones<WH6106> are consumed.<WH6244>

I was<WH1961> a reproach<WH2781> among all<WH4480> <WH3605> mine enemies,<WH6887> but especially<WH3966> among my neighbors,<WH7934> and a fear<WH6343> to mine acquaintance:<WH3045> they that did see<WH7200> me without<WH2351> fled<WH5074> from<WH4480> me.
I am forgotten<WH7911> as a dead man<WH4191> out of mind:<WH4480> <WH3820> I am<WH1961> like a broken<WH6> vessel.<WH3627>

For <WH3588> I have heard<WH8085> the slander<WH1681> of many:<WH7227> fear<WH4032> was on every side:<WH4480> <WH5439> while they took counsel<WH3245> together<WH3162> against<WH5921> me, they devised<WH2161> to take away<WH3947> my life.<WH5315>
But I<WH589> trusted<WH982> in<WH5921> thee, O LORD:<WH3068> I said,<WH559> Thou<WH859> art my God.<WH430>
My times<WH6256> are in thy hand:<WH3027> deliver<WH5337> me from the hand<WH4480> <WH3027> of mine enemies,<WH341> and from them that persecute<WH4480> <WH7291> me.
Make thy face<WH6440> to shine<WH215> upon<WH5921> thy servant:<WH5650> save<WH3467> me for thy mercies'<WH2617> sake.
Let me not<WH408> be ashamed,<WH954> O LORD;<WH3068> for<WH3588> I have called upon<WH7121> thee: let the wicked<WH7563> be ashamed,<WH954> and let them be silent<WH1826> in the grave.<WH7585>
Let the lying<WH8267> lips<WH8193> be put to silence;<WH481> which speak<WH1696> grievous things<WH6277> proudly<WH1346> and contemptuously<WH937> against<WH5921> the righteous.<WH6662>

Oh how<WH4100> great<WH7227> is thy goodness,<WH2898> which<WH834> thou hast laid up<WH6845> for them that fear<WH3373> thee; which thou hast wrought<WH6466> for them that trust<WH2620> in thee before<WH5048> the sons<WH1121> of men!<WH120>

Thou shalt hide<WH5641> them in the secret<WH5643> of thy presence<WH6440> from the pride<WH4480> <WH7407> of man:<WH376> thou shalt keep them secretly<WH6845> in a pavilion<WH5521> from the strife<WH4480> <WH7379> of tongues.<WH3956>
Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD:<WH3068> for<WH3588> he hath showed me his marvelous kindness<WH6381> <WH2617> in a strong<WH4692> city.<WH5892>

For I<WH589> said<WH559> in my haste,<WH2648> I am cut off<WH1629> from before<WH4480> <WH5048> thine eyes:<WH5869> nevertheless<WH403> thou heardest<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of my supplications<WH8469> when I cried<WH7768> unto<WH413> thee.

O love<WH157> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> all<WH3605> ye his saints:<WH2623> for the LORD<WH3068> preserveth<WH5341> the faithful,<WH539> and plentifully<WH5921> <WH3499> rewardeth<WH7999> the proud<WH1346> doer.<WH6213>
Be of good courage,<WH2388> and he shall strengthen<WH553> your heart,<WH3824> all<WH3605> ye that hope<WH3176> in the LORD.<WH3068>
